articles.title: Russia Shifting War Focus To 'NATO And The West,' Says EU Official - Radio Free Europe / Radio Liberty
articles.description: A senior EU official says Russia has taken its war against Ukraine to "a different stage" through indiscriminate attacks on civilians and nonmilitary targets, while criticizing Moscow for triggering recent moves by Germany and the United States to send advanc…
articles.content:
Russian forces have pressed on with a multipronged offensive in the eastern Ukrainian regions of Donetsk and Luhansk as Kyiv's Western allies continue to display a united front in their support.
